Package net.rim.device.api.ui.text

Provides classes to filter text strings containing various kinds of data.

See:
          Description

Class Summary
BreakIterator  
EmailAddressTextFilter Filters out characters not usable in URL text strings.
FilenameTextFilter Filters out characters not usable in filename strings.
HexadecimalTextFilter Filters out characters not usable in hexadecimal text strings.
IPTextFilter Filters out characters not used in IP/Port text strings
LowercaseTextFilter Filters out characeters not usable in lower case text strings.
NumericTextFilter Filters out characters not usable in strings showing numeric data.
PhoneTextFilter Filters out characters not usable in phone number text strings.
TextFilter Defines fundamental functionality for a text filtering object.
URLTextFilter Filters out characters not usable in URL text strings.
UppercaseTextFilter Filters out characters not usable in upper case text strings.
 

Package net.rim.device.api.ui.text Description

Provides classes to filter text strings containing various kinds of data.
